fields.author: Maya Angelou
fields.content: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.

fields.author: Yoko Ono
fields.content: Simile in the mirror  Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.

fields.author: Og Madino
fields.content: Always do your best  What you plant now, you will harvest later.
Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
fields.author: MLK
Nigel Hamilton
fields.content: Thanksgiving is a time of togetherness and gratitude .

fields.author: Bruce Lee
fields.content: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.

fields.author: Confucius
fields.content: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

fields.author: Henry Ford
fields.content: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

fields.author: Henry Van Dyke
fields.content: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
